name: MirRush
description:
mirrush is a 3d game where you have to control a ball .the platform is an imaginary icy desert and the track is full of icy cylinders which players have to dodge. but the tricky part is if you look forward, the icy wind will freeze your eyes... luckily we have a mirror to see tracks behind us.

p.s: If you are playing on Browser, and face any resolution based issue, then please use full screen mode
